actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 8 (2d4+3) piercing damage and the target must make DC 11 Dex save or be knocked prone. The DC increases by 1 for each other porcellina that hit the target since the end of this porcellina's previous turn to a max of DC 15.

reactions.name: Squeal
reactions.desc: When a porcellina is hit with an attack it can let out a blood-curdling scream. Each creature within 10 ft. of the porcellina must make DC 11 Wis save or become frightened until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The porcillina has advantage on Wis (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on attacks vs. creature if 1+ unincapacitated attacker ally is within 5 ft. of target.

special_abilities.name: Poisonous Flesh
special_abilities.desc: A creature that touches the porcellina or consumes the meat of the porcellina must make DC 11 Con save or become poisoned for 1 hr.
